name: gnotifier
author: Michal Kosciesza <michal@mkiol.net>
title: GNotifier
description: Replaces built-in notifications with the OS native notifications. It works on Linux and Windows 10.

preferences.name: engine
preferences.title: Notification engine
preferences.description:
Defines how notification will be displayed. 
Possible options are: 
- built-in engine ('Standard'), 
- OS native engine ('GNotifier'), 
- custom shell command ('Custom command').

preferences.name: command
preferences.title: Custom command
preferences.description:
Custom shell command. This option is applicable only if engine option is set to 'Custom' value. 
Following variables can be pass to the command: 
- %title => notification title, 
- %text => body text, 
- %image => image url.

preferences.name: notifyIcon
preferences.title: Notification Icon
preferences.description:
Icon used for download complete and new message notifications. It can be either icon URL or a name. 
Examples: 
- 'file://c:\my-cool-icon.png', 
- 'nightly', 
- 'aurora', 
- 'gnotifier'. 
If value is set to 'default' then icon will be set based on application name (e.g. Firefox, Thunderbird, SeaMonkey).

preferences.name: timeout
preferences.title: Notification timeout (Linux only)
preferences.description: Timeout of the notification (in seconds). To set the default time, pass '0' value. Note that timeout may be ignored by some notification servers.

preferences.name: timeoutExpire
preferences.title: Notification expiration (Linux only)
preferences.description: Sets the notification to expire (Set) or to never expire (Unset). Note that it may be ignored by some servers.

preferences.name: downloadCompleteAlert
preferences.title: Download complete notification
preferences.description: If enabled, download complete notification will be shown everytime when downloading is finished.

preferences.name: clickOption
preferences.title: Download complete notification - Default click action
preferences.description: Default action for 'click' on download complete notification.

preferences.name: excludedExtensionsList
preferences.title: Download complete notification - List of excluded file extensions
preferences.description:
Comma separated list of filename extensions that will not trigger download complete notification. 
Example: 'html, js, jpg'.

preferences.name: maxDLbuffer
preferences.title: Download complete notification - Maximum number of simultaneous notifications
preferences.description:
Defines the maximum number of simultaneous notifications. 
For instance, '5' means that if you download less or equal 5 files at once, all will trigger individual notification, but if you download more than 6 files at once, only 1 multiple notification will be shown. 
Set to '0' to disable aggregation.

preferences.name: testDL
preferences.title: Download complete notification - Test
preferences.label: Test
preferences.description: Click on 'Test' to trigger download complete notification.

preferences.name: enableRSS
preferences.title: New message notification - RSS feeds
preferences.description: If enabled, new message notification for RSS items will be displayed.

preferences.name: maxMessageBuffer
preferences.title: New message notification - Maximum number of simultaneous notifications
preferences.description:
Defines the maximum number of simultaneous notifications for new messages. 
For instance, '5' means that if you receive less or equal 5 messages at once, all will trigger individual notification, but if you receive more than 6 new messages at once, only 1 multiple messages notification will be shown. 
Set to '0' to disable aggregation.

preferences.name: newMailOpen
preferences.title: New message notification - Open action
preferences.description: Defines how new messages should be opened when you click on notification.

preferences.name: newEmailFirstAction
preferences.title: New message notification - Default action
preferences.description: Default action of click on new message notification.

preferences.name: newEmailSecondAction
preferences.title: New message notification - Second action (Linux only)
preferences.description: Second action of click on new message notification.

preferences.name: newEmailThirdAction
preferences.title: New message notification - Third action (Linux only)
preferences.description: Third action of click on new message notification.

preferences.name: newEmailFourthAction
preferences.title: New message notification - Fourth action (Linux only)
preferences.description: Fourth action of click on new message notification.

preferences.name: aggregatedClickOption
preferences.title: New message notification - Default click action for multiple messages notification
preferences.description: Defines default action for 'click' on multiple messages notification.

preferences.name: emailTitleFormat
preferences.title: New message notification - Title template
preferences.description:
Template for notification title. Following variables are supported: 
- %s => subject, 
- %a => sender (name <e-mail>), 
- %m => sender e-mail, 
- %n => sender name, 
- %f => folder, 
- %v => server, 
- %k => size, 
- %u => account, 
- %b => body excerpt, 
- %c => number of unread messages, 
- %% => %.

preferences.name: emailTextFormat
preferences.title: New message notification - Text template
preferences.description:
Template for notification body text. Following variables are supported: 
- %s => subject, 
- %a => sender (name <e-mail>), 
- %m => sender e-mail, 
- %n => sender name, 
- %f => folder, 
- %v => server, 
- %k => size, 
- %u => account, 
- %b => body excerpt, 
- %c => number of unread messages, 
- %% => %, 
- \n => newline.

preferences.name: aggregatedEmailTitleFormat
preferences.title: New message notification - Title template for multiple messages notification
preferences.description:
Template for notification title. Following variables are supported: 
- %C => count of new messages, 
- %c => number of unread messages, 
- %% => %.

preferences.name: aggregatedEmailTextFormat
preferences.title: New message notification - Text template for multiple messages notification
preferences.description:
Template for notification body text. Following variables are supported: 
- %[format]{n} => format definition ('format' - has the same variables as 'Text template' for single notification, 'n' - first n e-mails), 
- %C => count of new messages, 
- %c => number of unread messages, 
- %% => %, 
- \n => newline.

preferences.name: foldersAllowedList
preferences.title: New message notification - List of folders to allow notifications from (Whitelist)
preferences.description:
Comma seperated list of folder names (or account name, folder name pairs). 
For a example, 'My email|Inbox, My folder' allows notifications from 'Inbox' folder under 'My email' account and from any folder with name 'My folder'. 
Set to blank to allow all or to use blacklist filtering.

preferences.name: foldersDisallowedList
preferences.title: New message notification - List of folders to disallow notifications from (Blacklist)
preferences.description:
Comma seperated list of folder names (or account name, folder name pairs). 
For a example, 'My email|Inbox, My folder' disallows notifications from 'Inbox' folder under 'My email' account and from any folder with name 'My folder'. 
Set to blank to allow all. Filtering won't work if whitelist isn't blank.
